titles.title: Anatomical Structures, Cell Types, plus Biomarkers (ASCT+B) table for Blood Vasculature v1.3

subjects.subject: Anatomical Structures, Cell Types, plus Biomarkers (ASCT+B) table for Blood Vasculature v1.3

descriptions.description: [Anatomical Structures, Cell Types, plus Biomarkers (ASCT+B) tables](https://hubmapconsortium.github.io/ccf/pages/ccf-anatomical-structures.html) aim to capture anatomical human body parts, the typology of cells, and biomarkers used to identify cell types. The tables are authored and reviewed by an international team of experts. A description of this blood vasculature ASCT+B table can be found in the pre-print of "Anatomical structures, cell types, and biomarkers of the healthy human blood vasculature" by [(Boppana et al. 2022)](http://biorxiv.org/content/early/2022/03/01/2022.02.28.482302.abstract). The database and code used to generate the more simplified view of the blood vasculature in these ASCT+B tables may be found [here](https://github.com/hubmapconsortium/hra-vccf).

alternateIdentfier.alternateIdentfierType: How to Cite This Data Table

alternateIdentfiers.alternateIdentfier: Griffin Weber; Sujin Lee; Rajeev Malhotra. HuBMAP ASCT+B Tables. Blood Vasculature v1.3 https://doi.org/10.48539/HBM948.FMZR.475, Accessed on December 15, 2022.
